name: Utkal University Placement Portal Project
tagline: Created By Students For The Students
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages. Hi all this is going to be used as Code Repository and Sub Version Management Tool for our Utkal University Placement Portal Project. ### Members GuideLines To maintain a perfect code base i would like to request all the members to follow some of the rules, as follows 1 - All members should create their GitHub Account to access the project .
2 - All members should Fork , Follow , and set Watch option on to the Main Project.
3 - Instead of directly doing editing into any code all members are requested to copy thee project to their system and work on the project .
4 - After successfully done the work test it properly in your local systems browser.
5 - And send me a Pull Request.
6 - All web pages should include one one document for describing their functionalities along with the initial owner name of that page, any changes made to any web page will be recorded in the corresponding document page along with the region, date, and owner of the modification .
NOTE : No member can remove or edit directly to the main Project Repository For Any Changes members/developers has to send a Pull Request . ### Project Initiatives The Initiative taken by the University Placement Officer , and development started by group of brilliant students who belongs Integrated MCA Department and later on to make this project more successful students from M.Tech (Computer Science & Engeenering) joined the development process . ### Developers and Contributors Mr Sarit Panda (@Utkal University Placement Officer)
Mr Anit (@Student at Integrated MCA)
Mr BiswaRanjan Samal (@Seminar Secreatry, Mtech-cse)
Mr Santosh Kumar Dash (@Joint Seminar Secreatry, Mtech-cse)
### Support or Contact Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
